      • addToStack

        public void addToStack​(int index,
                       Picture editToAdd)
        adds an image to a specific index of the stack and removes anything on top of it, making it the last placed item in the stack
        Parameters:
        index - the slot where the image needs to go
        editToAdd - the image to add to the stack
